events.trigger: Scout proposed 299 SEK/mån, Analyst adjusted to 199 SEK
learnings: Scout: Research competitor pricing BEFORE proposing
Analyst: Explain reasoning gently to preserve relationships
Analyst: Check for free alternatives, not just paid competitors
Skeptiker: Good catch on Lantmännen free tool

events.trigger: Team Debrief revealed Equipment Maintenance was killed twice
learnings: Scout: NEVER propose Equipment/Fleet/Vehicle maintenance again
All agents: Learning system prevents repeated mistakes

meta.reason: This event led to creation of SOUL + LEARNINGS system

summary: Day of conflicts but learning. Scout frustrated by repeated kills, but relationships improved through Team Debrief reflection. System evolved to prevent future repetition.
key_learnings: LEARNINGS.md system created to prevent Equipment Maintenance repeat
SOUL.md gives agents identity beyond just tasks
Team Debrief enables reflection and relationship repair
